website_summaries.verdict: A classic, no-nonsense letter board for those wanting a simple product at a cheaper price.
pros: Available in a variety of stylish colors
Light oak frame matches almost all home decor
Comes with 300 characters and storage pouch
cons: A few customers received the wrong board color in shipment

customer_reviews.title: It’s a must have!
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased the light pink one and fell immediately in love! Such great quality I had to get the gray one. I’m obsessed now, My husband is probably looking at me like, “how many felt boards do you need?” The answer is I need all. They’re all so gorgeous!!! I am so grateful with the quality of the letters as well. Sturdy! As a blogger, these boards come in handy so much and it makes EVERYTHING much more fun. My daughter has started to enjoy these felt board as well
customer_reviews.author: ZL

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things! The board is super cute and perfect in my kitchen. I was surprised and thrilled with how many letters, numbers, punctuation marks, etc. came with the board. I thought for sure I would need to order more but that is simply not the case, Felt Like Sharing was more than generous with them! The board itself is sturdy and well made, and the ribbing is tight enough that you don't have to worry about letters falling off. Felt Like Sharing is a super responsive and pleasant company to work with and I have a feeling that I will be ordering many more boards from them in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun little gift to treat myself with
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun little gift to treat myself with. This board is not only affordable but it’s made really well & with love. I love supporting small businesses - especially those who really put in the quality & time to make their product great. I especially love that you can go to their website & enter in the quote you want your board to say & it’ll let you know if you have the proper space for it. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love our pink felt letterboard
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love our pink felt letterboard. It is exactly as pictured and just what I was looking for to use for announcing our daughter’s birth. It will be perfect for her room as well. Considering buying a more neutral color to put in our kitchen. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in Every Way!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with my felt letter board! The yellow is even better in person, and the frame and everything is so sturdy and well-made. It was packaged so lovingly and the box it came in is the perfect size and can be reopened and closed easily! Also, it shipped very quickly, which is a plus. Couldn't be happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Wholeheartedly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: This board is unbelievably awesome!! I am in love. The packaging is adorable, the size is perfect, and the product is very well thought out and of good quality. It comes with a great amount of letters - unlike many other letter boards on the market. This is a family owned business, and you can tell by the way they go above and beyond to make sure you are satisfied. I am so happy to support a business like this. I recommend this product 100%, and am thinking of getting it in other colors as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a felt letter board for a long time now but most brands were just so expensive! This exact board with the pink felt was featured on a bloggers gift guide and I immediately put it on my Christmas wish list! The board is very well made and stands out from all the other boards out there with the pink felt! It was also so much more affordable than the rest and offers the letters in different colors on their site.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty’s Tunes

customer_reviews.title: A bloggers DREAM item
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my felt letter board & letters. It's super easy to assemble & works beautifully with my Instagram aesthetic. I've received so many compliments about it! The light pink is true to color & the letters are sturdy & easy to place. I'm ordering the pastel letters next!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Farmer - A Fierce Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Color & Felt Letter Board
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this purchase! I ordered the seafoam green felt letter board and the color is spectacular! High quality and nice weight. The price point is so fair compared to other letter boards and one of the most full ranges of colors I've seen. Loved this so much and even have a light pink on on the way. Perfect for my plant instagram! I highly recommend I can't wait to see other colors they come out with!
customer_reviews.author: Apartment Botanist

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, high-quality letterboard!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, sturdy letterboard! Totally obsessed with it. Really great value for a high-quality letterboard and all the letters! Beautiful grey color. It comes packaged beautifully too, which is a wonderful touch from this family-owned business. Considering buying another one in a different color! So happy I chose this board from Felt Like Sharing.
customer_reviews.author: Aliesha Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Great for decor and photo staging
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new felt board! It’s so much fun to switch out messages and the color is beautiful! Very well made, I highly recommend this product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Cade

customer_reviews.title: I love my new letter board
customer_reviews.text: I love my new letter board! The packaging was so pretty and thoughtfully done. I love supporting small businesses that think about the little things. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: eadrian1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item !!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved my felt board just like I expected! cute packaging, loved the little save the letter bag that's included. The felt board is nicely trimmed with a nice wood edge and the pink color is just like pictured. Also there is plenty of letters included!! Fast shipping and fordable!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lopez Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase of 2017
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this board! It is very sturdy, and came packaged so cute. I love being able to support small businesses - If you feel the same, this is the shop for you! I have this set up in our kitchen and it’s defintely a conversation piece. This also came with tons of letters, so you’ll be able to say whatever you want and have plenty of letters to do so! This has been one of my favorite - if not my absolute favorite - purchase of this year!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Curnutte

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This board is just absolutely perfect! Supplied with an abundance of letters, you can write just about anything your heart desires! I originally purchased the pink board for a bridal shower I was hosting and it was a total hit, now it’s doubling as the motivational kick I need every am ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for to announce our pregnancy! It arrived quickly and the quality was excellent. It's going to be a great addition to our daughter's nursery once she arrives. I would gladly recommend this to anyone looking for a felt letter board.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Such attention to detail!
customer_reviews.text: I received my beautiful board yesterday and I’m just in love. All the tiny little details were just amazing! From the box it came in, to the bag to hold all the letters, to the online layout guide to get you started, absolutely everything has been thought of and supplied to you. I also am in love with the Instagram community and #feltlikesharing. The board is very well made and looks wonderful! I can’t wait to update mine with all the cute quotes and sayings.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a little deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the grey letterboard at the last minute to do our social media baby announcement. I had planned to have professional pictures done around 12wks but my husband kept telling people I was pregnant and someone accidentally spilled the partial beans on fb. The letterboard served its purpose and my only disappointment was that I thought the months of the year were included and in cursive, they are not. I saw that in several pictures and had no idea it didn’t really come with all that. Either way, our announcement was cute and I plan to use the letterboard for other baby related things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've always liked these felt letter boards
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked these felt letter boards. The prices are pretty outrageous for what they are. Either way, this one cost less than many of the ones I've seen (some up to $60+). It is stated on the description that it is American owned... question is: Is it all made in the US? It has TONS of characters that come with it and is packaged nicely if you are giving it as a gift. they also give a website to "design" your board before you put it together, quite helpful. So the one star off is for price. I'd probably give back the star if all materials were from the US. I'd pay more to support all local material/manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ting

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging & Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Presentation is amazing! I loved the packaging! The board is very sturdy. Loved the amount of letters. I do wish there was an option to have a background change instead of buying a whole new letter board. That should be an option! Overall I love the board and brand. Don't hesitate, purchase it! I purchased to share milestone updates of my 3 year olds and prop. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nekitina

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this, I was so nervous because I really didn’t know what to expect. Will it be great material that will last? I wanted a super girly one to use for my girls and loved this blush pink color. When I received this, I was SO happy with everything! The color is beauuuutiful!!! I also love how the board itself had a weight to them and have the option to hang on the wall. Now I need more colors and to figure out how to organize the letters!!! Wooo hook thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ZL

customer_reviews.title: Very cute decor piece, time consuming at first
customer_reviews.text: The only negative is that it takes a bit of time to cut off every single one of the letters/numbers from the plastic attachments, and you have to really cut each one closely so all the plastic attachments are removed from each letter (use sharp scissors or use small sharp knife on cutting board). Be careful not to cut off the back "lip" of each letter where you put it in the grid board! Letters are not heavy duty plastic but work well for the price. Cute decor item for home, office, or gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Cutting the letters out is a pain.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. It is packaged wonderfully to gift. However, I dont want to make my niece sit there and tediously cut out all of the letters, so now I have to do it before I gift it to her. Honestly, it sucks because if you don't cut it just right, there is a little tab left on the letter and (if you're a perfectionist, like me) you have to cut each letter several times to get it right. For the price, I expected this to come ready-to-use. I'm sure she'll love it though, after I do the work.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift and it is so beautiful and well made. It’s sturdy and heavy and extremely well made. The colors are vibrant and the letters do not fall out. I loved the provided bag to hold the collection of letters. It included two FULL set of letters 4-6 of each letter. You can literally make any phrase. We assembled the phrase “Friends are like stars, they come & go. The ones that stay are the ones that glow” The whole phrase fit perfectly and there were SO MANY letters left. We barely touched the second set. We will 100% purchase this product again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: killahpandah

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: There are much more expensive felt boards on the market, so all things considered this one isn’t *bad* but it certainly isn’t great. I’ve only used it once (but re-arranged the letters maybe a dozen times) and there is already a spot where the letters don’t really “stick”. The letters themselves are also a bit of a disappointment; despite being meticulous and careful in removing each letter, they each have a significant “tail”. I wish I’d spent an extra $10 on a better quality board! The grey color is lovely, however.
customer_reviews.author: EmTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Letter Board
customer_reviews.text: We got this letter board recently to create messages for home decor. The item was nicely packaged in a compact box. There were two bags of plastic letters and the letter board. Since we got multiple boards we noticed that the letters varied between the different packages, some were slightly yellower than others. Additionally the wood frames can vary a lot, some woods are lighter and have finer, nicer grain. Keep that in mind if you have these side by side, don't expect them all to be too similar. Overall happy with the purchase, these seem sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Yushi W.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put letters in
customer_reviews.text: This is totally subjective and I have never owned a felt letter board, but this was way more difficult and time consuming than I had expected. The letters were pretty difficult to stick in, but I guess that also means they'll stick in longer and won't fall out. But it was definitely a process and I've used it once, and have no tried to reword the board or take the letters out ever since. Again, all letterboards may be like this and I'm just not aware and it really is a personal preference thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lee

customer_reviews.title: Really nice letterboard
customer_reviews.text: I got these because they are the perfect matching color for my baby blue pregnancy announcement. There were cheaper letterboards but they didn't have the baby blue background that I wanted. This will be great for future announcement or pictures I want to do for little baby boo. It came in great packaging, letters are a little annoying to take apart one by one but they provide a nice baggy to hold everything in. Letters and numbers are easy to stick into the board and they don't fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good Felt Board
customer_reviews.text: The thing I never knew I needed but loving it now that I have it. I bought this to announce our baby's birth but have had so much fun using it for every holiday. It's definitely tedious breaking apart/cutting all the letters out when you first get the product and every time I change out the board, it takes ages. But I kind of enjoy the process. The felt is already starting to snag a bit after changing it only 5 times, but that's expected for felt. Overall, it is a well-made, good quality board, and I am obsessed the brand name "Felt like Sharing" . Thanks for making me trendy ;)
customer_reviews.author: Tia W.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Home Decor & Lots of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This letter board serves great for funny quotes, to-do lists, and just about anything that has to do with words. With their online layout tool, it is easy and super fun to arrange sentences. I would totally recommend it for anyone who'd like to add a finishing touch to their home decor or use it in a photoshoot.
customer_reviews.author: Hsinju

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully packaged with such care
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but this product is exceptional. The packaging was done with such care -- the presentation was lovely. I wouldn't hesitate to send this as a gift with no extra wrapping, because it was just out together so nicely. The board itself is a great size (if you're looking for smaller) and seems very well made. It comes with a large amount of letters. This board is already on my wall and being used for my daughter's sight word practice. It's adorable and well worth the money! I got the pink background and I'm in love.
customer_reviews.author: Roofus Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the variety of letters and board.
customer_reviews.text: Love this board. I was a bit nervous at first size wise but it is perfect and I got it off deals of the day for $11. I wish I got two. The only down fall for me, which I made work fine pictured above, is that it only came with two dollar signs. I’m using my with my own stand for my farmers market table and I would have liked a whole row of dollar signs. However, the selection of letters was beyond great. I had all listed here and several vowels left to create more/change what I had. Overall, very satisfied with product, delivery, and box setup
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cute for girl’s room- only 1 issue! UPDATE- RESOLVED!
customer_reviews.text: This board is absolutely precious. We are using for our daughter’s nursery. UPDATE: The company, Felt Like Sharing, sent us a new set of letters to replace the ones that I couldn't use with a nice note apologizing. This was totally unecessary, but they are sure doing customer service correctly! We will go to them in the future for any more letter boards and accessories! The ONLY issue I had, is that some of the letters (maybe 15 total) came covered in some kind of black grease that I’m finding really hard to remove. I may not be able to use those, but otherwise this is such a cute board and perfect for a little girl’s room.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really like the rich burgundy color and the wood is nice. I’m taking away one star because for the price I would’ve liked it to come with either the letter already cut out or little scissors like I saw other brands including. Sniping off the little plastic attachments wasn’t fun and sometimes left plastic on the letters. (See photo)
customer_reviews.author: Christine D.

customer_reviews.title: Love @ First Write
customer_reviews.text: Dear Felt Like Sharing, Thank you for my beautifully made letter board & matching oak wood stand. I am so happy with my purchase. The board is well made & will be a lovely keepsake for years to come. Future buyer, I do recommend getting the compatible oak wood stand, it’s the perfect partner for your board. Shipping was super fast & can we talk about the product packaging? WOW!!!! Wrapped with love! I really appreciated all the details:) Thanks a million! xoxo
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I want to start by saying that although I have found that letterboards are NOT my thing, this is a great product. This was my first time using letterboards and I tried a few different brands. This is by far the best. You get a lot of letters, numbers and symbols. You also get a cute little bag. The website is extremely helpful and you can even try your design online first to see how it looks. It is easy to use and very good quality. Aside from the fact that I find them to be too much work in general, this is a GREAT product.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome letter board
customer_reviews.text: I love this board. It looks better then the pic. Came on time and nicely packaged. You will receive a lot of letters, numbers and periods, question marks and apostrophe’s. Letters come with a cloth bag to store unused ones. The letters insert into the board and do not fall out. They are very secure. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: amy adams

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an announcement/milestone board for our son. I was very impressed with the overall quality. I did also purchase the matching stand which I highly recommend for displaying. It comes with plenty of letters. I used a pocket knife to shave off some excess "nubs" that lingered when separating the letters from their frame. Not necessary but it did give them a cleaner look.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Quality Letter Board
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love our letter board, the quality is top notch and you can tell Felt Like Sharing pays attention to detail from how it was shipped. I was too excited to get into it I forgot to take a picture but other reviews have them. Very happy with my purchase and would highly recommend to anyone looking for a quality letter board!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Davis

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFULLY PACKAGED! Perfect for a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I cant say enough about the care and consideration the sellers have taken on this product. the product was meticulously packaged with ribbon, (spoiler alert) a thank you card, and even a little picture. The board is nicely designed, sturdy, and just as advertised. Comes with a cool little pouch for the unused letters. Can't say enough about the care the sellers put into this item. I have this seller saved and will look to their store for ANY item. :)
customer_reviews.author: Julio Jr

customer_reviews.title: My teen approves
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my teenage daughter, this was her first message on her board. Need I say more? It’s cute, functional and...yeah lol
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.

customer_reviews.title: Buy! Absolutely adorable and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh. It truly doesn’t get any cuter when it comes to decor. From the moment I opened the package I was enchanted with this product. It takes time and some small scrapbook scissors to cut all the letters apart but worth the time so they don’t have the little nubs on them. Adorable! I debated giving this as a Christmas gift but it’s so cute I’ve decided to keep it and get another one. I can’t wait to decorate with it! So many possibilities. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SRiteNow

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my pride heart
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it may be to much for my pride heart lol, but note if you have cats that like to scratch thing be carful, I left it for a sec and they scratched it messed it up a little, pulse a little tedious to “brake or the letters” but once to do it’s cool
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: After giving my granddaughter one of these for Christmas (she loves playing teacher), I decided I had to have one of these for myself. Mine is hanging on the wall in my kitchen and I change the message weekly. I just bought another one to give as a wedding shower gift. It is packaged beautifully. I opened it up and put a message on it for the bride-to-be: Love Is Great C & D (initials of bride and groom) Then, I packaged it up again and wrapped it up as a wedding shower gift. This board is so much fun and could be used in any room of the house--really!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Doeden

customer_reviews.title: Decent board
customer_reviews.text: This felt board is nice. But I don’t like that the letter are stuck on this stick and you have to twist them off which can leave a weird bump on the letter. I did start cutting them off with scissors which looked nicer and was a little quicker but time consuming. There are a lot of letters and numbers which is nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: The best felt letter boards!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best felt letter board that I have ever owned, and I will always return to this company (Felt Like Sharing) when I want more of them for my home or for gifts. It is heavy and sturdy; from the moment I took it out of the box I could tell that it was extremely well-made. The board arrived to me beautifully packaged with a thank you note from the seller. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Makes Me Smile!
customer_reviews.text: OMGoodness! What fun! lol The day I received this, I dropped my briefcase and purse by the door so I could rip open the box! I sat and plugged in all the letters and presto! I cannot take credit for this wording. I saw this on Pinterest or Facebook. Maybe even Instagram. I forget. But how it made me laugh the first time I saw it. Now, every time I check the time, it still makes me smile! Frame is really nice and letters slid in easily. Highly recommend! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TXgirlnNH

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the house
customer_reviews.text: This is something cute! From the box it comes in to the final look of it on the wall, I absolutely love it. It comes with a small bag to hold all the individual letters, numbers, and symbols which is so convenient. The only pain is separating all the letters from the plastic holder but a good pair of scissors gets the job done quick.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, for all occasions!
customer_reviews.text: Love this board! I use it to write silly notes to my husband sometimes but also for holidays (pictured). It's easy to put together and even when the spacing isn't perfect it still looks good (to me). Some of the letters are tricky getting off the plastic track they come on but once they're off you don't have to do that again so that's a small issue with an otherwise great product. I plan to use this as a month to month update when we have our first child.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Carr

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this board for my daughters birth announcement photo but have now been using it for monthly baby updates. Great packing, quality and comes with a great assortment of letters and numbers. Very satisfied with this product purchase
customer_reviews.author: Connie G.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good purchase but can use some improvements
customer_reviews.text: This is a great felt board and is super cute for decor for all occasions. My only complaints are that some letters are really difficult to break off and use (e.g. Letters with two stubbles attached). Also, when when broken off, there are remaining stubbles that are on the letter which ruin the asthetics of the board. I would also recommend buying a bead organizer to organize the letters as it will take a long time to find all the letters you need.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Colorful Letter Board! Perfect for Instagram!
customer_reviews.text: I found this product via a fellow business owner's Instagram feed and fell in love! I'd been eyeing these for a while but didn't realize there were colorful options available. I scooped up the pink one right away. It's a bit lighter in-person than this photo suggests, but I don't mind that at all - I'm actually happy it is because it matches my brand colors (@florapothecarie) better. The board itself is really high-quality, sturdy wood and it came with a great selection of letters and symbols so I don't feel like I'll ever run out when creating a message. I'm so happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Sami Jo

customer_reviews.title: Love this letter board!
customer_reviews.text: NOT a retrogram board like I thought. I felt a bit bait and switched because that’s what I was searching for specifically... BUT! I love this board, the quality is great and the light pink is super cute. The 10x10 size is a great size for our bar top. There are tons of letters and I haven’t run into any issues where I can’t write something out that I want to. I definitely recommend, but just note it’s not an official retrogram board.
customer_reviews.author: BadNewsBenjamin

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Having fun with this board. I had another one from a local craft store, but it was plastic and didn’t allow using add on letters; I could only use theirs (which I found out the hard way after denting the plastic). No issue like this now! This came with smaller letters than my other board, so now I have more options. I’m enjoying sharing with this board on my crafting and travel journeys. As it’s 10 x 10, it’s really easy to take along.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love this letterboard. Super cute and sturdy. Came really well packaged. The letters are a touch difficult to remove from the package. I recommend using a sharp pair of scissors or a blade to carefully remove some of the trickier pieces. All in all this is a great board and super aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Casaundra Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service for damaged product
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent - sturdy and beautifully packaged and the colors are great. I ordered two and one had very slight damage, and the company quickly shipped me a replacement that came two days later - it's always a relief when you don't have to go through a headache from an online purchase. I will definitely buy more of these as gifts in the future and highly recommend purchasing this if you are looking for a felt letter board.
customer_reviews.author: Stega Dreamcast

customer_reviews.title: Lots of letters!
customer_reviews.text: So cute!! Even the packaging was adorable! I loooove how perfect it matches our rainbow e-learning classroom. And it's so much fun to leave inspiration notes to my kids on it. It comes with lots of letters, numbers, and signs. I have several boards like this but none of the others have as much as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Pinkney

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and fun!
customer_reviews.text: The gray felt really compliments my gray decor which is why I chose this one (besides the fact this product had glowing reviews). All the correct pieces came along with a little bag/pouch to hold the letters. It was time consuming to take off every letter, number, and symbol off the little racks holding them but it was worth it! All the pieces fit in the felt just fine and are easy to take off (I just use my nail to peel from the top and pull down to remove them). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon A

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed when I got my letter board is the super cute packaging. I love gifts and it was like opening a birthday present! I didn’t spend much money on this so, honestly I expected a bit lesser quality - and I was ok with that - BUT I was unprepared for how sturdy and high-quality my board is! Why would anyone spend more?!?! I love that they have different sizes and colors and I will most likely be adding to my collection soon! 😉
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Hagemann

customer_reviews.title: So so so worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a cute sign to put in my window since my dogs are brats and like to wake up the entire world with their barking when people knock. This sign is now a staple in my house! It got all the way to Guam SUPER fast, it came with a gazillion letters and its was bubble wrapped and clean and adorable! the company really takes great care in their packaging! I even kept the box to store it in cause it was so cute! I ordered the white square board and I absolutely love it!!! I'll definitely be purchasing more in different sizes and colors!
customer_reviews.author: jackson m.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Love this even more than I thought I would. The color and size are perfect. The letters pop in and out easily and being able to digitally lay out the letters online beforehand is so convenient. There's plenty of letters and symbols. I only wish the bag was a tiny bit bigger so that all the extra letters would fit without having to be taken apart. The packaging was so lovely and chic. This would make an awesome gift
customer_reviews.author: samanthann92

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I use this each week to take progress pictures of my puppy's growth. It's so cute and nice quality. The only thing I didn't like was taking all of the little letters off of their original plastic piece that held them all together. Sometimes they just wouldn't want to break off and other times they kind of scratched me in the process, but if I would have just gotten scissors out or something it might have gone better. Regardless, I would still 100% recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: K. Ann

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I like this item overall, but two gripes. First, I wanted this board for promotional work and it doesn’t have the % symbol. I’m really disappointed. I wanted to be able to post discounted prices (such as ___% PROMO). Second of all, these letters were a real pain to detach. You have to take them off the stencil one by one, and it was very tedious.
customer_reviews.author: RayRayBoomBoom

customer_reviews.title: Love my letter board!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new letterboard! The gray color is exactly what I was looking for and the size is perfect too. Not too big. It came packaged so cute, all tied up with string. They offer a layout tool online that I have not used yet, but I definitely will because that is a super great way to not waste all day trying to get your layout and design just right for the gram!
customer_reviews.author: KHmn19

customer_reviews.title: I do not regret this impulse buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It has so many letters. The frame has enough space to fit long phrases so that is really nice too. I like that it can be hung up on the wall, it gives you more options for styling your space. I've seen people use these for baby announcements and office spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you're looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I love this felt letter board. I read the other reviews that said it would have every letter you'd need and it's true. Even when writing full length sentences, I always have enough letters for my messages. I got the light pink and it's a perfect shade for me. The wood frame is nice, too and makes it look more expensive. The packaging is so cute too, and comes with a website for planning how to fit your message nicely on the board! 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: lo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these for a long time but couldn’t stomach the price on other websites. This one is awesome! I love it and it’s so cute. I probably would have been mad if I would have spent more than like $22 on this because it’s annoying to change the wording so I haven’t used it as much as I thought I would.
customer_reviews.author: heartmel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product!
customer_reviews.text: I made an affirmation message for girl empowerment and boosting confidence for pre-teens. Looks gorgeous! The product is well made and I had no trouble attaching the letters to the felt. The only thing I would change would be a letter organizer for when the letters are not in use (instead of the little bag the product comes with). This is a great inspirational board and would be a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Khaleesi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby's first birthday party
customer_reviews.text: I saw a post image from a friend's Instagram, which encourages me to order this product. It turns out really great when I received it. The package is in high quality and looks beautiful. Of course, it took me a while to cut all the letters and made them perfect without white plastic piece. But I felt really happy when I finished the first look. I am pretty sure that I will use the board a lot in future!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mei

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it’s a little time consuming in the beginning to get all the letter and numbers off but it’s it that bad! Except for the M’s those made my fingers hurt as I was twisting to free the letters but they were attached on to 2 places instead of 1 as all the other letters
customer_reviews.author: DjRuba

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful board
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of this board. I first thought it was a little pricey but upon receiving it I see why it is priced as it is. The board itself is very durable and high quality. The letters are sturdy enough and the carry bag is a cute touch. I’m very happy with this purchase. We will be using to announce our daughters arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This board is great! There are so many letters that I know I’ll be able to write anything I want to. The packaging is adorable and you can tell they put a lot of time into the presentation. Perfect wedding gift or just fun to have around the house.
customer_reviews.author: C&H

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is packaged so cute! You could almost just stick a bow on it and gift it. I'm not even sure what to say about the quality.... the board is very sturdy, very plush, very nice. I just love it. You can't go wrong with this board.
customer_reviews.author: suzr

customer_reviews.title: Cute and quality item!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the letter board primarily to use as a ‘back to school’ sign. When I received it, I was initially impressed with how cute it was & the amount of letters/numbers/symbols I received. The letters came attached to plastic & I had to pull it apart, but it was not difficult. I liked how easily the letters went ontonthe board, but felt secure. I also liked that there was a link to a website to help with letter placement.
customer_reviews.author: K. McCue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all types of use!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our baby announcement!! We are car fanatics and already are building a hot rod stroller (in the pic). We flaked the frame silver because we do not know the gender yet. The felt is extremely nice and there are more than enough letters and numbers! We plan on using this for monthly photos as our baby grows! Absolutely love and recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Simple way to make someone's day
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to keep in the vanity area of our bathroom so I could leave messages/affirmations every now and then for my girlfriend. It looks great, and the grey felt board contrasts nicely with the wood frame that helpfully has a wall hanger on the back of it. The letters are easy to separate off of their plastic molds and fit snugly in to the felt board while still being easy to get out. Also, there's a lot of them, making it easy to write longer messages - complete with punctuation and flair. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Conversation Starter
customer_reviews.text: Given this gift to two friends, and they both loved it! The colors are great and people love leaving little messages for each other using the board. The little storage baggie is also cute to tuck behind the board itself. This does have to be balanced on another object, because it doesn't stand alone!
customer_reviews.author: Ziyue Wang

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous! Bought one for each of my girls. They love them. I bought the 10 x 10 size. The colors are exactly as expected and the board itself is much sturdier than I expected. Beautifully packaged, perfect for a gift. So many letters, numbers and symbols, there’s plenty for anything my girls would want to say.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply packaged and made 👎
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it was presented as a cheap board with letters ok. There was no box or attractive packaging. The board had no way of standing up. It has a sign that says thank you for supporting our small business. Well I am not concerned about supporting someone else. I feel like getting a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S Vitale

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as Mother’s Day gift for my mama and I just know she’s gonna love it. I’m probably going to buy one for myself as well! It’s very sturdy, comes with plenty of letters, and the wooden frame is beautiful. I love that it can be used for so many occasions, my mother loves to decorate for the seasons/holidays and she can definitely put this to use for each one. Only thing I wish it had was a kickstand, like picture frames have. But otherwise, the price was right and it’s adorable!
customer_reviews.author: alainanoelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging and popular gift
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I've bought three since I learned about them a month ago. Sweet packaging/presentation adds to quality if you're giving it as a gift. I personally feel the 10x10 is a little small if you want the message to be seen from a distance, but is nice if taking pictures, or for hanging college dorm. Nice colors.
customer_reviews.author: KAD

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving my felt board, I anxiously opened it and began taking apart the letters. Some came off easier than others with a little twist. I used a pair of wire cutters to trim the excess plastic tabs off the more stubborn ones. I went to hang it and realized the picture hanger was placed on the wrong side. Even though this was an easy fix, I emailed the store owner. She was so sweet and personable and immediately sent me a whole new board! I'm very pleased and glad I was able to support a small business owner. I will happily recommend "Felt Like Sharing" for all your felt board needs!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s a fun way to customize and change my decor in my living room. We use it for parties and just for funny phrases throughout the seasons. Highly recommend! Set up was a bit difficult because the letters come in sheets that you have to separate. I ended up using scissors on these. I love the carrying case for the letters. Overall I love this and would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Schlundt family

customer_reviews.title: Cheap flimsy letters don’t stay on felt board
customer_reviews.text: Got around to using this for the first time for back to school photos didn’t even make it one minute into the photo shoot and the cheap letters were falling off and would not stay on.! Not to mention the letters are so flimsy and you have to twist them off the plastic grid they come on, which leaves a sharp plastic nub at the end of each one ! Looks cheap. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: SRH

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these! I've ordered 3 of them for Christmas presents and put personalized messages on them for each person. The wrapping is great and cute for gifting. The board itself is well-made. There's plenty of letters and a cute little bag to keep the unused ones in. The letters go into the felt well and feel sturdy for staying put. I only ordered grey, but I'm tempted by the colored ones.
customer_reviews.author: Owensbritt1

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome! Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! I have the coral one and it is super adorable. It's really well made. I get a ton of compliments on it. It came with a lot of letters too which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Emily and Blake Heiner

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this letter board. It’s made well. It is very sturdy and durable. It’s super easy to use. It comes with tons of letters, which are easy to put on the board and move around. I 100% would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Such a sturdy letter board. Great quality. I couldn't believe that these were so pricey, but in actual fact they are VERY high quality and I'm so glad I spent the money on this :) If you are looking for a felt letter board, this is the one. (I want more, larger, in more colors :) I shall be back!) Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Mhairitschka

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little signboard
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our Airbnb rental, which we recently had remodelled in seafoam green, and this was the only board that we could find that matched our decor. It was a bit smaller than we had expected, but our guests seem to love being greeted by it when they walk in the door. So, we're happy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Goss

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Breast Cancer Survivor
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a special gift for a friend who received some good news as she entered her final chemo treatment. This gift did not disappoint. It was fun for me to come up with an inspirational quote for her and she LOVED it! The quality of this board is great and there are tons of letters!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well made!
customer_reviews.text: this board is very well made! the felt rolls are tightly put together. the frame feels smooth and good quality. i would definitely buy from this seller again if i need another color or if i want to give it as a gift .
customer_reviews.author: Anita L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute letter board
customer_reviews.text: Super cute letter board. The letters does not come cut out, which sucks but it’s not hard to cut them yourself. I use a scissor to cut out the letters then a nail clipper to clip off the part that is still poking out to give it a cleaner look. I do wish it came with an organizer for the letters so I can separate them but it does come with a bag where you can store the letters. You’ll just have to look through all of the letters to find the one you want. Overall, very cute and comes with enough letters. P.S. I blurred parts of the pic to hide full name.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality for an even better price!
customer_reviews.text: It seems like the market is being inundated with letterboards these days, but Felt Like Sharing’s boards are the best I’ve seen- especially for the highly affordable price! Great quality with tons of color and size options available. They even have a virtual layout tool on their website so you can practice your alignment and see how certain phrases and quotes will look on your board! Plus it’s a small family business and who doesn’t love to support one of those?! If you aren’t sold yet, check out their Instagram page for tons of ideas! We love this company and our felt letterboard!
customer_reviews.author: Callie Canfield

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my classroom...absolutely LOVE! It is a little smaller than expected, but the quality is fabulous and it was super easy to put the letters on. Not to mention, the packaging was so beautiful, which is always a good sign that the seller is serious and takes good care of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product! Came in super cute packaging and happy to be supporting a small business with this purchase. You get a lot of letters. It's a little time consuming to separate them all but I'm happy with the amount of letters you get. Would buy again and as a gift for others.
customer_reviews.author: Lil_Bear87

customer_reviews.title: Cutest letterboard!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute packaging and the felt board is the perfect size! Love the gray coloring on the felt and there are a good amount of lettering/numbers to work with. Would be a cute and fun gift also!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best letter board around!!
customer_reviews.text: This letter board is PERFECT. Such great quality and workmanship. Apologies for the super nerdy wording (shoutout to futurama fans), but comes with as you can see an abundance of letters! It arrived extremely well packaged, the product is exactly as described, comes with a ton of letters and a cute little drawstring pouch to keep them in. The wood is fantastic quality with a built in hook for hanging on your wall if you want. 11/10 would recommend to anyone! I will never ever get a cheap one from a department store again!
customer_reviews.author: Abs_101

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking to buy. We are actually going to use this for a baby announcement but it can be used for so many other things like first day of school photos, family photos, and even home decor. Of course my husband put the first thing that came to his mind. Anyone like The Office?
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality - Wonderful Color
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something coral color for my daughters nursery/bedroom and came across these. I love them, great quality and you get a lot of letters/numbers with them so I could easily make any phrase I wanted. Now my other daughter wants a set in her room and I will definitely order them from this company!
customer_reviews.author: dobiegirlmom

customer_reviews.title: This felt letter board worked out amazingly for my sons birth announcement.
customer_reviews.text: This felt letter board worked out amazingly for my sons birth announcement. In the hospital, it was the perfect size to fit inside the plastic rolling bassinet with him and it gave his pictures a rustic vibe. Also, they provide lots of letters, so don’t be afraid if you lose a piece because there is many more. The only downside was that some of the letters don’t stay in as tightly to the felt as other letters, so once in a while a letter would fall out.
customer_reviews.author: pheonix808

product_meta.title: Light Blue Felt Letter Board 10x10 Inches. Changeable Letter Boards Include 300 White Plastic Letters and Oak Frame.
feature_bullets: 💖 WHILE OTHER LETTER BOARDS ARE poor quality, with WARPED, CRACKED FRAMES & GLUEY EDGES, Felt Like Sharing Handmade Light Blue Letterboard is crafted with love with a 10x10” STURDY, HAND-SELECTED WARM OAK FRAME that is GROOVED, GLUED & ANGLE-STAPLED for enduring, TIMELESS QUALITY THAT LASTS through all your precious moments.

💖 THE LUXURIOUSLY SOFT BLUE FELT ON our announcement board with letters is made from SUSTAINABLE POLYESTER. NO MISSING LETTERS HERE like with other letterboards sets. We get EVERY DETAIL DOWN to a T. Your 300-PIECE ¾” Character Set comes with a handy DRAWSTRING POUCH & every display board comes pre-installed with a RUGGED SAW-TOOTH HANGER for wall hanging. ALSO CHECK OUT OUR custom, wooden block stand for countertop display.

💖 OUR ONLINE TOOL IS free with your felt boards with letters. Tailored to the Felt Like Sharing memo board specs, you can PRE-DESIGN each rustic letter board with FAVORITE QUOTES to ensure the PERFECT FIT before lettering. Let your bold, clever, sappy or sassy shine! SHOWCASE a baby gender reveal, pregnancy announcement or just HIGHLIGHT YOUR MOOD. Share on Social with the INCLUDED “HASHTAG” & “AT” symbols! #FeltLikeSharing @FeltLetterBoards

💖 WITH 25+ VIBRANT OF COLOR boards & 8 Letterboard Letters sets available, our felt message board with letters is uber giftable as gifts for women, Christmas gifts or gifts for mom. And Felt Like Sharing word board with letters come in OH-SO-CUTE PACKAGING! Choose from every COLOR OF THE RAINBOW or MULTI-COLOR changeable letter board. Our UNIQUELY COLORED letters for letter board come in PASTEL, BRONZE, PINKY PROMISE & more. We can wait for you to TELL YOUR STORY!

💖 FELT LIKE SHARING WAS BORN OF a leap of faith. As husband & wife, we left our careers to build an AMERICAN-OWNED, FAMILY BUSINESS that allowed MORE TIME FOR OUR FAMILY. Our PASSION IS SHARING LIFE’S WONDERS in a unique & timeless way. Our WORD-FOR-WORD PROMISE: You love your felt letter board or we’ll make it right, no matter what.

specifications.Material Type: Handcrafted Oak, Premium Felt Board, Plastic Letters
